EmbedPlayer.OverlayControls.doc: If the player controls should be overlaid on top of the video. Can also be set to false per embed player via the overlayControls attribute.

EmbedPlayer.EnableIpadHTMLControls.doc: Set to false to use native device controls on iPad. By default this is true. We use HTML controls on iPad.
EmbedPlayer.EnableIpadHTMLControls.description: The Kaltura player supports configuring native controls on iPad.
